```{r}
library(readxl)
trash_wheel = read_excel(path = "./data/mr_trash_wheel_data.xlsx", sheet = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(vol_y3 = volume_cubic_yards, cigs = cigarette_butts) %>% 
  select(-x15) %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster:date) %>% 
  round(sports_balls, digits = 0) %>% 
  as.integer(sports_balls)
```
